title: How to Press Crumbled Eyeshadow

steps.headline: Get a small pot or container and a stick or spatula of your choice.
Taking the stick, remove all the eyeshadow from the pot, before moving it into your container.
Using a small brush, remove all the tiny bits and pieces left behind, and add them to your container.
steps.description: It may seem silly, but you'd be surprised at how much this adds up.

steps.headline: Break up the eye shadow so that there are no more lumps left behind.
steps.description: You should have a fairly fine powder.

steps.headline: Taking any alcohol you have (like vodka), mix a little into the eyeshadow to form a paste.
steps.description: If need be, add a little more.

steps.headline: Taking your stick or spatula, move the paste into the eyeshadow pot.
steps.description: You can also use your fingers for this step.

steps.headline: Take a small dish and fill it with alcohol (not too much, though!).
steps.description: Wrap a small coin (about the size of your eyeshadow pot) in a piece of cloth and dip it into the alcohol, so that the cloth it totally wet.

steps.headline: Taking the coin, press it down onto your eyeshadow pot.
steps.description: This will help smooth out your eye makeup.

steps.headline: Clean up around the edges and that's it, you're done!
